body_html: It's hard to say why do you see the slowdown especially that I don't have any information about your script and mode. For example do you use CUDA or just CPU? What kinds of ops do you have? Are you sure you compiled with cuDNN support? Are you sure you compiled with MKL?

body: It's hard to say why do you see the slowdown especially that I don't have any information about your script and mode. For example do you use CUDA or just CPU? What kinds of ops do you have? Are you sure you compiled with cuDNN support? Are you sure you compiled with MKL?
